title: [NA] [Gruesome Death Zone] Recruiting
body:
Recruiting NA players that are silver-gold looking for a club of people that want to climb and get better at the game. We practice and give each other tips on how to improve your game-play. However we're not just a climbing club, we play a lot of unranked and fool around with each other. If you're interested you could reply here, add me in game (ZeroMercyBuddy) or join our Discord, which is our main information/communication platform. https://discord.gg/ktc2ppa

Application Format:
IGN:
Age:
Rank:
Do you have discord?(Not required but highly recommended):
What Timezone are you in?:
Reason for wanting to join(To climb, To have fun/fool around, both):

You will be interviewed within 24 hours upon acceptance.(Short 3-5 minutes) Good Luck to all that apply!

replies.body:

Do you have discord?(Not required but highly recommended): Yes
What Timezone are you in?: Pacific
Reason for wanting to join(To climb, To have fun/fool around, both): To climb and to have fun playing the game that I know and love!
